text: The Future of Emily is a 1984 German French drama movie directed by Helma Sanders-Brahms and starring Brigitte Fossey, Hildegard Knef, Ivan Desny. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1984 drama movies Category:German drama movies Category:French drama movies Category:Movies directed by Helma Sanders- Brahms Category:Movies set in Berlin Category:Movies set in France
title: The Future of Emily
